snippet: For the second time in two years, Senate Republicans filibustered the confirmation of Caitlin J. Halligan to become a federal appeals court judge in the District of Columbia.
abstract: Senate Republicans block confirmation of Caitlin J Halligan to become a federal appeals court judge in the District of Columbia, second time in two years Republicans have filibustered her nomination.
lead_paragraph: For the second time in two years, Senate Republicans filibustered the confirmation of Caitlin J. Halligan to become a federal appeals court judge in the District of Columbia.

headline.seo: Senate Republicans Again Block Confirmation of Caitlin Halligan to Be Federal Judge
headline.main: Republicans Block Judicial Nominee’s Confirmation for a Second Time
headline.print_headline: Republicans Block Judicial Nominee’s Confirmation for a Second Time
